import React,{ useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useSpring, animated } from 'react-spring' const Groupe4 = () => { const props = useSpring({ to: { opacity: 1 }, from: { opacity: 0 }, config: { duration: 5000 } }) const scrolling = useSpring({ from: { transform: "translate(60%,0)" }, to: { transform: "translate(-60%,0)" }, config: { duration: 2000 }, reset: true, //reverse: key % 2 == 0, onRest: () => { setKey(key + 1); } }); const [anim1, setAnim1]=useState(false) const [anim2, setAnim2]=useState(false) const [anim3, setAnim3]=useState(false) const [anim4, setAnim4]=useState(false) const [anim5, setAnim5]=useState(false) return (

avec des cibles différentes
